meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with glossitis after examining their tongue.
meanings.sent2: Her glossitis made it difficult for her to eat spicy foods.
meanings.sent3: The glossitis was so bad that the tongue felt like a hot chili pepper.
meanings.sent4: The glossitis was a fiery dragon burning the tongue with its inflammation.
meanings.sent5: The glossitis turned the tongue into a red, swollen balloon.

meanings.definition: Swelling and redness of the tongue.
meanings.sent1: The glossitis caused the tongue to become red and puffy.
meanings.sent2: He had to see a doctor for his glossitis because his tongue was so swollen.
meanings.sent3: The glossitis made the tongue look like a big, ripe tomato.
meanings.sent4: Her glossitis turned her tongue into a bright red beacon.
meanings.sent5: The glossitis painted the tongue in shades of red and made it bulge.

meanings.definition: Pain and discomfort in the tongue.
meanings.sent1: The glossitis caused sharp pain whenever the patient tried to speak.
meanings.sent2: She winced in discomfort due to the glossitis affecting her tongue.
meanings.sent3: The glossitis turned the tongue into a grumpy little monster, causing pain with every word.
meanings.sent4: His glossitis was like a tiny dagger stabbing at his tongue with each movement.
meanings.sent5: The glossitis made the tongue feel like it was being squeezed in a tight grip.
